widget.name: mpViewer
widget.author: mp107
widget.description: Preview pdf, doc, docx, ppt, pptx, xls, xlsx, odt, pps, pages, ai, psd, dxf, svg, eps, ps, ttf, xps files in the browser. The extension allows the user to open a files with Google Docs, Zoho Sheet Viewer or Samurajdata Viewer (depending on filetype). This extension is based on addon Documents preview version 1.1 developed by prelud.
